org.jamesframework.ext.permutation.neigh

Class ReverseSubsequenceNeighbourhood

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamesframework.ext.permutation.neigh.ReverseSubsequenceNeighbourhood
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Neighbourhood<PermutationSolution>

    public class ReverseSubsequenceNeighbourhood
extends Object
implements Neighbourhood<PermutationSolution>
    Permutation neighbourhood which generates moves that reverse a subsequence of the permutation.
    Author:
    Herman De Beukelaer

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomMove

        public ReverseSubsequenceMove getRandomMove(PermutationSolution solution,
                                            Random rnd)
        Create a random move that reverses a subsequence of the permutation.
        Specified by:
        getRandomMove in interface Neighbourhood<PermutationSolution>
        Parameters:
        solution - permutation solution to which the move is to be applied
        rnd - source of randomness used to generate random move
        Returns:
        random move, null if the permutation contains less than 2 items

      • getAllMoves

        public List<ReverseSubsequenceMove> getAllMoves(PermutationSolution solution)
        Create a list of all possible moves that reverse a subsequence of the permutation. A move is generated for each pair of distinct positions i,j in the given permutation. The returned list may be empty if the permutation contains less than 2 items.
        Specified by:
        getAllMoves in interface Neighbourhood<PermutationSolution>
        Parameters:
        solution - permutation solution to which the move is to be applied
        Returns:
        list of all possible moves
